title: The Moonpainters
description: Come ride through California and Oregon with two sixteen-year-olds, Maggie Malone and Julia Chandler, as they come of age on the open road. Maggie is struggling for independence from a father who insists she give up her dream of becoming an artist to work in a bank. Julia is struggling with an eating disorder. When they meet two older boys traveling cross-country in a vintage van, the adventure of a lifetime ensues. What will happen to these best friends on their odyssey for self-discovery and self-acceptance, and will they ultimately survive their journey?
author: Suzanne Burns
